item.description:
Let's go Italian! Capa Di Roma, a family run restaurant with great reviews. I met Emelia at a wine tasting festival (pouring rain, of course) where they had a table showcasing their famous sauce which is available in Stop & Shop. Her brother Frankie will be on staff Wednesday night when we go.

Please be prompt, they close at 9:00pm so we will need to get under way with our dinner orders without delay. Plenty of parking. The website is http://capadiroma.com...

Please be aware that they have a limit of one Restaurant.com coupon per table, they will allow us to use a maximum of three which I have purchased, so whoever gives me $1.00 at the event to defray the costs of this meetup gets $3.00 off their bill.

PLEASE BE AWARE THAT IF YOU CAN NOT MAKE IT AFTER REPLYING "YES", YOU MUST CHANGE IT TO "NO" AT LEAST 48 HOURS PRIOR TO THE EVENT!!

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: CAPA DI ROMA
